attributes.action: increase funding of public services by retaining Inheritance Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in response to a petition which requested the reverse: to ABOLISH Inheritance Tax by CUTTING public services.  This would disadvantage everyone who NEEDS public services and CAN'T AFFORD to pay for them themselves.  In my opinion Inheritance Tax is the least punitive tax because it is paid on the death of the tax-payer, and comes out of his/her estate, so that he/she is not personally affected at all.

rejection.details: Please re-draft without all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
